title: Arabian children
creator_credit: Donald G. Hoffman and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The life of a family living on a farm in Saahab in TransJordan. Describes the events of a typical day and shows the children minding sheep, working in the fields and in the house, going to school and visiting a nearby village. It also emphasises the importance of water and the camel to their way of life.
